text: Mataan! a Skami na inilahaman Ami ska (ya Mohammad), sa lagid o kiyailahami Ami ko Noh go so manga nabi ko miyaoriyan iyan: Go inilahaman Ami so Ibrahim, go so Ismail, go so Is´haq, go so Ya´qob, go so mbawataan iyan, go so Eysa, go so Ayyob, go so Yonos, go so Haron, go so Solayman, go inibgay Ami ko Dawood so Zaboor
